skills.skill: MS Power Apps and Power Automate Flows

duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead and conduct advanced, complex organizational, operational, and performance studies with statewide impact
Assist in the adoption of MS Power Apps and Power Automate business enablement tools
Develop, oversee, and review organizational-wide position papers, policies, regulations, and legislation
Facilitate groups, conduct research, and develop recommendations
Review and evaluate analyses of VDOT operations, prepare sensitive responses for submission to other branches of state government
Lead business process re-engineering studies and documentation efforts
Lead activities, programs, and projects associated with the implementation of VDOT's Strategic Plan
Propose and coordinate strategies for meeting stated Purpose, Mission, Goals, and Values
Analyze performance measurements, targets, and reporting methodology to ensure VDOT direction and policies are incorporated into organizational performance and workforce planning
Propose and implement solutions to impediments to expected outcomes
Work on special projects that may have agency-wide impact

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in industrial engineering, operations research, economics, statistics, or related field (Master's preferred)
